```{r prep}

```

```{r full Model}
m_gam <- gam(Hospitalisierung ~ Neuerkrankung + Altersgruppe + Bundesland + 
               s(index, bs = "ps", k = 50) + 
               s(Kalenderwoche, bs = "cc", k = 50) +
               Bundesland * Altersgruppe + Neuerkrankung * Altersgruppe + 
               Neuerkrankung * Bundesland,
             data = final_df,
             method = "REML",
             family = "nb")
summary(m_gam)
gam.check(m_gam)
```
